description: This Python source file contains functions and Flask route handlers for cloning GitHub repositories, listing files in a repository, and retrieving file contents. It manages repository cloning, directory operations, and HTTP API endpoints for interacting with repositories.

methods.name: clone_repo
methods.description: Clones a GitHub repository to a local directory, handling authentication if credentials are provided.

methods.name: list_files
methods.description: Lists all files in a specified cloned repository directory.

methods.name: get_file
methods.description: Reads and returns the content of a specified file within a cloned repository.
